reviewText:
I'll follow suit with the craptastic reviews for this movie. What a bomb. And I don't mean that in the vernacular of today's youth meaning to be great. This was a stinker, plain and simple.

It was hard for me to watch Danny Glover in this movie. If this would have been the first time for me seeing him work, I would NEVER want to watch another thing by him again. The acting sucked, the writing sucked, the storyline sucked. Basically, it sucked. Never again.
